special_text:
Whenever you activate one of Sadie's loyalty abilities, you get an emblem with “Eureka!” [i](It has “At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.”)[/i]
[+1]: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
[-3]: Return two target cards that don't share a type from your graveyard to your hand.
[-5]: You may put any number of land cards from your hand and/or graveyard onto the battlefield.
